009package Tools;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
013import imagingbook.core.FileUtils;
014import imagingbook.core.Info;
015
016/**
017 * A simple ImageJ plugin for validating the 'imagingbook' installation.
018 * 
019 * @author W. Burger
020 */
021public class Check_Installation implements PlugIn {
022
023        @Override
024        public void run(String arg0) {
025                IJ.log("Executing plugin ...... " + this.getClass().getName());
026                IJ.log("Operating system ...... " + System.getProperty("os.name") + " / " +
027                                System.getProperty("sun.arch.data.model") + " bits");
028                IJ.log("Java version .......... " + System.getProperty("java.version"));
029                IJ.log("Java runtime .......... " + System.getProperty("java.runtime.version"));
030                IJ.log("Java VM ............... " + System.getProperty("java.vm.version"));
031                IJ.log("ImageJ version ........ " + IJ.getFullVersion());
032                
033                try {
034                        IJ.log("imagingbook location .. " + FileUtils.getClassPath(Info.class));
035                        IJ.log("imagingbook version ... " + Info.getVersionInfo());
036                        IJ.log("imagingbook installation seems to be running OK.");
037                } catch (Exception e) {
038                        IJ.log("imagingbook libary not found:");
039                        IJ.log("make sure 'imagingbook-common.jar' is placed in the ImageJ/plugins or ImageJ/jars folder!");
040                }
041        }
042
043}
